column2: JPMorgan reaches $388 million settlement in mortgage securities case JPMorgan Chase & Co  agreed to pay $388 million to settle a suit by investors claiming that the largest U.S. bank had misled them about the safety of $10 billion worth of residential mortgage-backed securities it sold before the financial crisis. ~JPMorgan reaches $388 mln settlement in mortgage securities case July 17 JPMorgan Chase & Co agreed to pay $388 million to settle a suit by investors claiming that the largest U.S. bank had misled them about the safety of $10 billion worth of residential mortgage-backed securities it sold before the financial crisis. ~
